title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. V, subch. L, pt. 199 - Bedding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. V, subch. L, pt. 199 - Bedding

State Regulations
§ 199.1 - Label requirements for new and used bedding
§ 199.2 - Sanitizing standards for used bedding
§ 199.3 - Segregation of unsterilized articles of bedding or materials

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. V, subch. L, pt. 199

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §91; General

Business Law, §§385, 387

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
